name: Red Feather Fan
description: After you switch characters: The next Switch Character action you perform this Round will be considered a Fast Action instead of a Combat Action. It will also cost 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After you switch characters:</color> The next Switch Character action you perform this Round will be considered a $[K2] instead of a $[K1]. It will also cost 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After you switch characters:</color> The next Switch Character action you perform this Round will be considered a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Fast Action</color> instead of a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>. It will also cost 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)
storytext:
Legend has it that this fan is capable of unleashing various effects in the hands of a tengu warrior.
But in the hands of an ordinary person, it only possesses the power to "make one's body lighter."
Even so, this degree of power is more than useful for the average individual.
